items.sentence: Jill of the Jungle could transform into a phoenix, a frog, or a fish. The fish and the phoenix could both fire unlimited projectiles.
Tom left Boston at noon on June second and he got back to Boston at noon on September fourth. How many days was Tom away from Boston?

The American Cancer Society says the sooner smokers stop smoking, the more they can reduce their chances of cancer and other diseases.
